activities.name: Deep Breaths
activities.instructions: Breathe in slowly through your nose for 4 seconds. Hold it for 2 seconds. Now breathe out through your mouth for 4 seconds. Do this 5 times. Feel how calm you are!

activities.name: Cloud Watch
activities.instructions: Close your eyes and picture a blue sky. Imagine fluffy clouds floating by. Each cloud carries a worry away. Watch them drift until the sky is clear and calm.

activities.name: Belly Breathing
activities.instructions: Put your hand on your belly. Breathe in deep and feel your belly push your hand out like a balloon. Now breathe out and feel it go flat. Do it 8 times. So relaxing!

activities.name: Muscle Melt
activities.instructions: Squeeze your fists really tight for 5 seconds. Now let go and feel them relax. Do the same with your shoulders - scrunch them up, then drop them. Try your whole body!

activities.name: Happy Place
activities.instructions: Close your eyes. Think of your favorite place in the whole world. The beach? A fort? Grandma's house? Picture what you see, hear, and smell there. Stay for one minute!

activities.name: Rainbow Calm
activities.instructions: Look around the room and find something red. Now orange. Then yellow, green, blue, and purple. Take a slow breath between each color. You just made a calm rainbow!

activities.name: Body Scan
activities.instructions: Close your eyes. Think about your toes. Are they relaxed? Now think about your legs, your belly, your arms, your face. Relax each part one by one. You are a melting ice cream!

activities.name: Quiet Hands
activities.instructions: Put your hands on the table. Feel how cool and smooth it is. Now feel something soft, like your shirt. Notice the difference. Try 3 more things. You are a texture detective!
